data.convo: Do you have any tables ? Yes . We've got plenty of tables in stock . Will you have a look at this one ? It's a nice color , and the style is not bad , but a bit too small . I'd like to get a slightly larger one . How about this one ? Mmm , I like it . How much is it ? Seventy US dollars . Here is the money . Could you deliver this to my house ? Of course . We are always at your service . Here is my name card . Thanks . You are welcome .
